meanings.sent1: She brought her beaus to the party, and they all looked handsome.
meanings.sent2: Her beaus always brought her flowers on special occasions.
meanings.sent3: The beaus lined up to impress her with their charm and wit.
meanings.sent4: His beaus were like knights in shining armor, always ready to protect and care for her.
meanings.sent5: The beaus in her life added color and joy to her days.

meanings.definition: A dandy; a man who is very attentive to his appearance.
meanings.sent1: He was known in town as one of the most stylish beaus, always impeccably dressed.
meanings.sent2: The beaus at the fashion show turned heads with their trendy outfits.
meanings.sent3: The beaus spent hours in front of the mirror perfecting their looks.
meanings.sent4: His beaus were like walking fashion magazines, setting trends wherever they went.
meanings.sent5: The beaus' sense of style was unmatched, making them stand out in any crowd.

meanings.definition: Plural of beau, meaning a male companion or escort.
meanings.sent1: The group of beaus escorted the ladies to the ball with grace and charm.
meanings.sent2: The beaus were always chivalrous, ensuring the ladies felt safe and respected.
meanings.sent3: The beaus' presence added an air of sophistication to the event.
meanings.sent4: The beaus were like gentlemen from a bygone era, treating their companions with utmost care.
meanings.sent5: The beaus' company made the evening truly memorable for everyone.
